defaultValue.text: Open-source low-code framework to build & deploy internal tools within minutes.

definition.value:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: LDOups
  version: 1.0.0
  description: ''
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
servers:
  - url: http://172.17.0.1:8000/api
    description: ''
paths:
  /users:
    get:
      tags:
        - User
      summary: Get users
      description: ''
      deprecated: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: User collection
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                    dn:
                      type: string
                    attributes:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        cn:
                          type: string
                        displayName:
                          type: string
                        sn:
                          type: string
                        objectClass:
                          type: string
                        mail:
                          type: string
                        givenName:
                          type: string
  /groups:
    get:
      tags:
        - User
      summary: Get groups
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Group collection
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                    dn:
                      type: string
                    attributes:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        cn:
                          type: string
                        member:
                          type: string
                        objectClass:
                          type: string
components:
  securitySchemes:
    BasicAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: basic
security:
  - BasicAuth: []

defaultValue.text: Open-source low-code framework to build & deploy internal tools within minutes.
